content: Update source to in_vitro_summary_mod_t_test_compare_median_normvar_02282023_flipped.csv
Add extra line on top of each in vitro and in vivo page
Refactor rendering template, each table now has its own template
Fix the Feedback page issue
Add differential_LFC density graph to GI day 5 and 10
Add differential_LFC and Additional_differential_LFC density graph to SI and SI Kinase
Add 8 different effect size graph to in vitro page
Add In Vitro Table
Add In Vivo Table
User can see SI result
User can see SI Kinase result
User can see GI Day 5 result
User can see GI Day 10 result
Imporve async logic for data insertion
Add Empty page to plain data view
Add corresponding search query in knex query.js
Add DevLog page, user can click the version number at the bottom or DevLog on the top right to browse the change
Improved the search functionality. Users can input and search any data among Feature_name, ORF_ID, and Commons without specifying the type through a dropdown menu.
Updated the Search History Component.
Fixed the issue that images disappear when alternating between graceV1 and graceV2.
Now if the data does not exist, an EmptyData page will be displayed instead of a blank page.
Website Launched.
Search with the dropdown menu.
All data page
Feedback page
About page
Research Page
Overview Page
Home Page
Data Navigation Panel which allow user switch between Summary, Fu2021GeneFeature, GraceV1, Gracev2
D3.js frequency Histogram display in Fu2021GeneFeature page
Highlight selected cell of DOX/NODOX in GraceV1 and GraceV2
